title: Extracting contents of unknown file format
content:
I would love some help on working with this file format.

I have this archived file from this abandonware game that I like to mess around with, and I have tried all sorts to try and expand it to extract the files from inside (They are .vag audio files).

I am lost on what to do from now on. I have tried using TrID but no result from it. I have also tried using software like WinRAR, 7-zip etc, which cannot recognise the file.

I do not think this is a known file extension since I have never seen it anywhere before, and the internet has no idea what it is when I try to search about it.

I'd also love to ideally create an extraction tool so I can extract content from other file types ending in this .xbd format.

I will really appreciate any help given, thank you :)

.xbd file download (OneDrive)

comments.text: I would suggest RE the game that load the file

@rce Apologies, the game is Midnight Club 2, published 2003. Inside the .xbd file I believe contains .vag files. This is in 'assets_p.dat' which is where the game files are. This is the link to the assets [link] ( mega.nz/file/â€¦ ) The xbd file is located in audio. If this still isn't enough info let me know,
